brainly_data.question:
What did the federal road act authorize?
A) government ownership of all toll roads
B) a federal-state cost split for road construction 
C) states were given the right to set their own speed limits
D) the federal government would only finance star highways.
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question:
What did the federal road act authorize?
A) government ownership of all toll roads
B) a federal-state cost split for road construction 
C) states were given the right to set their own speed limits
D) the federal government would only finance star highways.
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: The act authorized a joint congressional committee to prepare a report on the issues involved in providing federal aid for highways. The post road program was plagued with problems.
